text: Gerhard J. Woeginger (31 May 1964 â€“ 1 April 2022) was an Austrian mathematician and computer scientist. He worked in Germany as a professor at RWTH Aachen University.. He was program chair of the European Symposium on Algorithms in 1997. In 1996, Woeginger won the Start-Preis.. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 2014. Woeginger died on 1 April 2022, at the age of 57. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Austrian mathematicians Category:Computer scientists Category:Members of Academia Europaea
title: Gerhard J. Woeginger
